name: AMP With Postlight Mercury
author: Morgan VanYperen

sections.description: This plugin adds some code to your page headers, letting Postlight provide an AMP solution for you, using their tool, Mercury. Find out how they do this here http://mercury.postlight.com/
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. There will be a new item in the wordpress administration menu called AMP With Postlight Mercury. Click on that, and you’ll find some links to info about Mercury, including their Terms of Service Agreement. You must check the box saying you agree to the TOS and save changes. Then, presto! They will do the rest of the work.

short_description: Let Postlight provide an AMP solution for you, using their tool, Mercury!
